## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G39040](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G39040)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABCB27, ALS1, AtALS1, ATTAP2, TAP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ATP-binding cassette B27, ALUMINUM SENSITIVE 1, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA TRANSPORTER ASSOCIATED WITH ANTIGEN PROCESSING PROTEIN 2, transporter associated with antigen processing protein 2
- **Description:**   transporter associated with antigen processing protein 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
